description: This file defines functions for creating KPI (Key Performance Indicator) cards and rows using the Streamlit library. It provides reusable components for displaying metrics in a Streamlit dashboard.

methods.name: kpi_card(label: str, value: str, delta: str | None = None, help_text: str | None = None)
methods.description: Creates a KPI card metric with optional delta and help text using Streamlit.

methods.name: kpi_row(items)
methods.description: Arranges multiple KPI cards in a horizontal row with columns.

ctags.name: kpi_card
ctags.pattern: /^def kpi_card(label: str, value: str, delta: str | None = None, help_text: str | None = None):$/
ctags.signature: (label: str, value: str, delta: str | None = None, help_text: str | None = None)
